xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:variable name="searchString" select="substring-before(substring-after(normalize-space(.), '${delim}'), '${delim}')" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length($searchString) > 0"> <xsl:value-of select="$searchString" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">UNSUPPORTED</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test=". = 'UNSUPPORTED'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Unsupported event type</xsl:text> </xsl:when> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

documentation.description: Given an event type for a given input event. Use common event model's eventCategory and eventSubCategory, like Service Down, Disk Full
